downloadTitle: Hotfix for Microsoft System Center Orchestrator 2012 R2 UR14 (KB4058494)
downloadDescription: This release contains a hotfix for Microsoft System Center Orchestrator 2012 R2 UR14 (KB4058494)

downloadFile.name: Microsoft System Center 2012 R2 – Orchestrator Hotfix (KB 4058494).EXE

detailsSection:
Summary

This release contains a hotfix for System Center Orchestrator 2012 R2 UR14. After applying UR14 the RunbookServerMonitorService.exe may not be able to connect to the database. This release provides a fix for this problem and should only be applied after applying System Center Orchestrator 2012 R2 UR14. This issue has been detailed in KB4058494.
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft System Center 2012 R2 – Orchestrator Hotfix (KB 4058494).EXE
systemRequirementsSection: Please note that this hotfix in only applicable for deployments running Microsoft System Center 2012 R2 Orchestrator which have already applied UR14.
installInstructionSection:
To install this update, follow these steps:
  1. Download the update file
  2. Click to open the file and accept the license terms
  3. Select the location where you want to extract the files contained in the update
  4. Navigate to the location where the extracted files are present and follow the steps in the Readme file
